name: Digital Hill
tagline: A digital edition of Hill's Sources for Greek History between the Persian and Peloponnesian Wars
body: A digital edition of [G.F. Hill, Sources for Greek History between the Persian and Peloponnesian Wars, Oxford 1897](https://archive.org/details/sourcesforgreekh00hilluoft)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
